idea-plugin.name: TabSwitch
idea-plugin.description: MRU open files/tabs switcher. By default mapped to Alt-A. Original TabSwitch developend by Timur Zambalayev.
idea-plugin.change-notes:
1.0:
Worked around bug in IDEA 5.0.2 (FileEditorManagerListener.fileClosed() never called)
Used Recent Files Limit setting for those who have a Tab Limit settings of 1
Now possible to assign a key to quickly switch between two tabs without modifiers or pop-up window (thanks to Marc Juul Christoffersen). 0.7.5: Fixed NullPointerException introduced in previous version when opening new project in same frame.
0.7.4: All files opened when opening a project are now added to the TabSwitch menu again (bugfix for IDEA #3354)
